feed.title: BORIS is an easy-to-use event logging software for video/audio coding and live observations.

entry.title: 2025-01-06: Pre-release of version 9 is available
entry.content: The pre-release of version 9 is available. This update introduces new features, including the ability to add plugins for data analysis (based on Pandas DataFrames). The graphical user interface is now based on PySide6. Test it and let me know
entry.summary: The pre-release of version 9 is available. This update introduces new features, including the ability to add plugins for data analysis (based on Pandas DataFrames). The graphical user interface is now based on PySide6. Test it and let me know

entry.title: 2025-01-06: Release of version 9.0.6 is available
entry.content: The version 9.0.6 is available! This major update introduces new features, including the ability to add plugins for data analysis (based on Pandas DataFrames). The graphical user interface is now based on PySide6.
entry.summary: The version 9.0.6 is available! This major update introduces new features, including the ability to add plugins for data analysis (based on Pandas DataFrames). The graphical user interface is now based on PySide6.
